description.narrative: The PDO is to enable selected poor households to enhance agricultural incomes and secure increased access to humandevelopment services and social entitlements.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Institutional Arrangements (I): Steering Committee and Project Implementation & | Description :GoT to establishand thereafter maintain: (i) a Steering Committee chaired by the Chief Secretary and comprised of the Principal Secretaries of eachline departments, and the CEO of SERP; and (ii) a Project Implementation & Review Committee to be convened by the PrincipalSecretary of the Panchayat Raj and Rural Development Department and comprised of the Secretaries of the various line department |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

title.narrative: % of exception reports generated by the Mother and Child Tracking system acted upon by the field functionaries
70% of the producers benefiting are from poorest and SC/ST households
Number of good qualitty technical support agencies working with the project
Number of partners working with the project in providing market access for producers
Where one stop shop has been established, percentage of eligible households with access to at least three entitlement programs or key services
% increase in use of HD services (ICDS, health and sanitation services) by households
% of enrolled beneficiaries in targeted gram panchayats who receive payments on time for key entitlements (NREGA, social pensions, Insurance)
Extent of utilization of ICT for measurement and decision support ( index to be developed)
Number of VHNSC and PRI members trained
50% incremental income increase of the target households
% increase in per unit price realization
No. of targeted panchayats that have operationalized one stop Shop services for safety nets and entitlements
% increase in pregnant and lactating women who practice core child nutrition and health care behaviors
% increase in productivity from improved practices among target farmers
Percent increase in quality and size of consumer basket purchased at a KRuSHE Mart
% of targeted households organized into producer organizations
% of villages in the target mandals that have prepared and are implementing Village HD/WASH plans
Project Implementation procedures and agreed business standards are followed for at least 80% of the project interventions
